Name: data
Desc: Retrieves or sets data-* attributes on the selected nodes. Provides an easy way to store and access custom data associated with the elements.
LongDesc: The 'data' method is a versatile utility for working with custom data attributes (data-*) on elements. It allows you to retrieve the value of a specific data attribute or set a new value for it. This is particularly useful for storing metadata or custom information directly on DOM elements, enabling dynamic and interactive web applications.
